titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the murder of Emmett Till.
A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the murder of Emmett Till.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Calls on: (1) all authorities with jurisdiction, including the Department of Justice (DOJ) and the State of Mississippi, to expeditiously bring those responsible for the 1955 murder of Emmett Till to justice and provide all the resources necessary to ensure a timely and thorough investigation; and (2) DOJ to fully report the findings of the investigation to Congress.
